product_overview: Tippy is a comprehensive local service marketplace platform connecting customers with trusted local service professionals across multiple categories including home services, personal care, and professional services, offering seamless discovery, booking, real-time tracking, and communication features.
core_goals: Provide secure, dual-role (customer and professional) authentication and profile management.
Enable easy discovery and search of local services with advanced filtering options.
Support professional onboarding with profile verification and management tools.
Facilitate real-time booking, scheduling, and management for users and providers.
Implement real-time location tracking with privacy controls during service delivery.
Enable direct communication through an in-app messaging system and AI chatbot assistance.
Integrate customer reviews and ratings for quality assurance.
Deliver analytics and insights for both customers and providers to optimize experience and service quality.
Offer a mobile-first experience with cross-platform support for web and mobile devices.
key_features: User Authentication & Profile Management with secure email/password via Supabase and role-based profiles.
Advanced Service Discovery with category browsing, filtering by location, price, rating, and availability.
Professional Provider Onboarding with multi-step profile wizard including business info and credentials.
Booking & Scheduling System supporting real-time availability, appointment scheduling, and payment processing.
Real-time Location Tracking with GPS-based provider tracking, arrival estimates, and privacy controls.
In-App Messaging with direct chat, file sharing, notifications, and message history.
AI-Powered Chatbot for customer support, service recommendations, and FAQs.
Review & Rating System for customers to leave detailed feedback and verified provider ratings.
Analytics & Insights dashboards for user booking patterns and provider performance.
Mobile-First Design using React, Capacitor for native apps, and responsive UI with TailwindCSS.
user_flow_summary: Customers discover services via category browsing or AI recommendations, then view provider profiles and reviews.
Customers book services by selecting providers, scheduling appointments, and receiving immediate confirmations.
During service, customers track provider location in real-time with privacy safeguards.
Post-service, customers rate and review providers to support quality feedback.
Providers register, create and verify their profiles, and manage service offerings and availability.
Providers receive bookings, communicate with customers via messaging, and track performance analytics.
Both customers and providers engage with AI chatbot for assistance and guidance.
validation_criteria: Authentication system securely manages dual user roles with proper route protection and password recovery.
Service discovery supports advanced filters and displays accurate provider and service details.
Professional onboarding workflow correctly collects business info, credentials, and service offerings.
Booking system validates real-time availability, processes payments within expected response times, and manages rescheduling/cancellation.
Real-time tracking updates location within 500ms latency and enforces user-controlled privacy settings.
Messaging system delivers real-time notifications, maintains message history, and supports media sharing.
AI chatbot provides relevant and accurate assistance tied to FAQs and booking workflows.
Review and rating submissions are stored securely and displayed accurately with verification checks.
Analytics dashboards reflect accurate data for customer usage and provider performance.
Mobile apps function responsively across devices with offline support and push notifications.
